price: 50 Voici le châtiment que vous mettiez en doute ! »
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
